remarks: If the domani is negligible, the function is integrable and the integral is 0.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
itgvol0.1 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ RR ) $.
itgvol0.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( vol* ` A ) = 0 ) $.
itgvol0.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
itgvol0 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( x e. A |-> B ) e. L^1 /\ S. A B _d x = 0 ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ph x $.
